fields.headline: The Measure
fields.bodyText: Going up Haim This sisterly pop-folk trio are going to be everywhere this year. Wednesday nights in David Attenborough's Africa series is a mid-week sofa date too good to break for anyone or anything. The side-split pencil skirt Swiftly demonstrates to the world that you're au fait with the 2013 fashions. Teatime gin Did we mention we're not detoxing? Heston's Earl Grey and lemon gin at Waitrose is the perfect collision between afternoon tea and cocktail hour. Hancock Named after Thomas Hancock, the godfather of rubber, this new rainwear brand sells jackets in shocking brights or sedate two-tones. Everything made in Scotland. Going down Jam jars as vases/cocktail glasses Death by Pinterest overexposure. We're all about an apothecary vase in 2013. Check out the Conran Marks & Spencer number. SoulCycle A situation with lit candles, exercise bikes, club music, positive mantras and spirituality gives us the fear. 'Chillax' Heard on a Ryanair intercom. Just saying. Shapewear Having to peel off your underwear like satsuma skin is getting boring. Want thermal fleece tights right now.
